Key Match Events: Breel Embolo scored in added time to complete Switzerland’s 3-1 win over Hungary
Kwadwo Duah opened the scoring for Switzerland in just his second game
Michel Aebischer made it 2-0 just before halftime
Post-Match Reflections: Swiss coach Murat Yakin expressed hope for Embolo’s comeback
Granit Xhaka stated Embolo is a very important player for the team
Hungarian coach Marco Rossi criticized his team’s first-half performance and tactical mistakes
Miscellaneous Highlights: Breel Embolo had not played for Switzerland in 18 months due to injuries
Hungary threatened a comeback but couldn’t score a second time
